metadata.title: CVE-2024-35840 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mptcp: use OPTION_MPTCP_MPJ_SYNACK in subflow_finish_connect()subflow_finish_connect() uses four fields (backup, join_id, thmac, none)that may contain garbage unless OPTION_MPTCP_MPJ_SYNACK has been setin mptcp_parse_option()

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
